struct.name: assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: divides_assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()/=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: divides_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()/lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: equal_to_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()==lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: greater_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() > lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: greater_equal_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() >=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: less_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()< lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: less_equal_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()<=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: minus_assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() -=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: minus_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() - lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: modulus_assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() %=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: modulus_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() % lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: multiplies_assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() *=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: multiplies_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() *lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: not_equal_to_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >() !=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: plus_assign_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()+=lvalue< Right >())>

struct.name: plus_base
struct.inherit: std::binary_function< Left, Right, typeof(lvalue< Left >()+lvalue< Right >())>

function.name: promote
function.type: lazy_disable_if< is_const< From >, mpl::if_< is_same< To, From >, To &, To > >::type

function.name: promote
function.type: mpl::if_< is_same< Toconst, Fromconst >, Toconst &, Toconst >::type

function.name: operator*
function.type: disable_if< mpl::or_< is_same< T, U >, is_same< std::complex< T >, U > >, std::complex< T > >::type

function.name: operator/
function.type: disable_if< mpl::or_< is_same< T, U >, is_same< std::complex< T >, U > >, std::complex< T > >::type
